name.value: Foundation National Institute for Cancer Epidemiology and Registration (NICER)

description.value: The data item records the unspecified multiplicity of multiple primary tumours at a single site. **m-Suffix of pT (Variable number: 4.9)** in \'NATIONAL CANCER DATA DICTIONARY, V 1.0, Part A, BASIC VARIABLES for Adults, Adolescents, and Children\' see [NICER](https://www.nicer.org/).
